item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, November 30, 2024 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Square Roots and Maxima (11 points | 1 comment)
2. Make the Most Of Your Burl (44 points | 16 comments)
3. Geometric line-art of Wacław Szpakowski (2017) (259 points | 29 comments)
4. Interview of Robert Shingledecker, Tiny Core Linux and DSL Developer (2009) (3 points | discuss)

6. Rust-Query (54 points | 10 comments)
7. Nodezator is a generalist Python node editor (130 points | 39 comments)

10. Making Screenshots of Test Equipment Old and New (66 points | 12 comments)
11. DeepThought-8B: A small, capable reasoning model (101 points | 67 comments)
12. Archaeometallurgical investigation of the Nebra Sky Disc (44 points | 7 comments)

15. The Influence of Bell Labs (171 points | 102 comments)
16. Neomacs: Structural Lisp IDE/browser/computing environment (82 points | 28 comments)

20. Lessons from 15 Years of Indie App Development (139 points | 50 comments)
21. Chinese researchers indicate diamonds can store data for millions of years (16 points | discuss)
22. The Revised SI of physical units (2019), Max Planck (1900), and 'Planck scale' (24 points | 4 comments)
23. Myths and Urban Legends About Dual-Socket Servers (9 points | 7 comments)
24. German WWII Soldier Grave Found with Mesolithic Tools, Roman and Byzantine Coins (94 points | 93 comments)
25. NASA's Europa Clipper: Miles Down, Instruments Deploying (115 points | 37 comments)
26. Engineers do not get to make startup mistakes when they build ledgers (506 points | 488 comments)
27. Core copyright violation moves ahead in The Intercept's lawsuit against OpenAI (266 points | 284 comments)
28. Institutional memory and reverse smuggling (2011) (101 points | 43 comments)
29. Gladiator Style Interviewing (15 points | 5 comments)
30. The UX of Lego Interface Panels (2020) (523 points | 45 comments)
